alert.note: Alert for Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 7:24PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: The National Weather Service in Key West has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lower Keys in Monroe County in Florida... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 724 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Upper Sugarloaf Key, or 9 miles northeast of Big Coppitt Key, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Key West, Big Coppitt Key, Boca Chica Channel Bridge, Boca Chica, Saddlebunch Keys, Sunset Key, Shark Key, Upper Sugarloaf Key, Fleming Key and Key Haven. This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 22. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
